title: Ayase, Hope's Last Frontier

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: **Cinderella Story** — Whenever you fail to kill someone, unlock the next set of bracketed text in your Glass Slipper ability.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Glass Slipper** — Attack someone each night. [This attack can't be blocked, redirected, or otherwise prevented by any means whatsoever.] [This attack is Unstoppable and Astral.] [You'll also deal an Unstoppable attack to all their visitors and gain Invincible defense.] [You die.]
**Shimmering Determination** — Spend the night to unlock the next set of bracketed text in your Glass Slipper ability. You may only do this Night 3 and onwards.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Prove that you're stronger than the rest.
